About Our Company

Our product lines include handbags, ready-to-wear, Sneakers, accessories, and watches; and it licenses its name and branding to Coty, Inc.

Ready to deliver the best in the fashion world

Felicity collection is currently owned by Godwin-Umoru Nature. It is a Nigerian luxury group. In 2022,the brand came into existence. They have ranked among in the list of top valuable brands and have helped improve the style of many. Felicity collection is the favorite brand of many models, bloggers, and fashion influencers. The trends and their revolutionary designs attract fashion enthusiasts.

Award One

15 July 2022 — The winner of the Sneakers Feast

Award Two

8 Nov 2022 — The winner of the Nigerian Womenswear Designer of the Year award

Award Three

25 Dec 2022 — The Winner of the best in trendy fashion of the Year award
